name: La Pascualita
description:
You’re a young woman who decided to travel to Chihuahua, Mexico to spend time with your sister and a good friend of yours. You’re very happy, because you’re days away from marrying the man of your dreams ... but you still need to choose your wedding dress.

Trailer:  https://odysee.com/la_pascualita:0f038c2980bab78fc20505a4f8b625d2ddb9e8a8
